fields.title: Walther's Golf & Fun
fields.description: Free admission with a report card (any grades accepted)! Both indoor and outdoor miniature golf!

fields.title: Pigeon Creek Greenway
fields.description: This trail is widely accessible throughout Evansville. Launch a canoe at Heidelbach!

fields.title: Hillside Gardens
fields.description: Both kids and adults are amazed to see magnificent live peacocks strut their feathers at Hillside Gardens Commercial Landscaping on North Saint Joseph Avenue.

fields.title: Free Concerts
fields.description: Check out University of Evansville’s free Tuesday night jazz and classical concerts! The Tuesday Faculty Recital Series will entertain and amaze kids of all ages! Free to the public. Wheeler Concert Hall.

fields.title: Youth Group
fields.description: Invite a friend to join you at a local church or synagogue youth group. (See PROGRAMS: Youth Ministries section of this app if you are not sure where to visit.)

fields.title: Jaunt Along The River
fields.description: Take a jaunt along the beautiful Ohio River in Newburgh or Evansville (or Wabash River). Enjoy the beautiful sunset!

fields.title: cMoe Children’s Museum
fields.description: Visit cMoe Children’s Museum. Free admission the first Thursday of every month

fields.title: Swings! Slides! Playgrounds!
fields.description: Visit any elementary school after hours or during the summer months. Try a different playground every weekend!

fields.title: Calling All Animal Lovers!
fields.description: Go hang out for an hour or so at an area humane society. Pick a kitten or puppy to play with inside. Walk a dog in the enclosed area outside.

fields.title: Event Indoor Play Areas!
fields.description: Visit the Chic-Fil-A or Pizza Hut indoor play area. Most area libraries and Eastland Mall also have play areas for younger kids.
